name: High Universe Industries Limited (Hong Kong)
overview:
We are a Hong Kong company with own manufacturers, loyal suppliers, and professional service personnel from Chinese Mainland. We have office in Guangzhou.

We deliver goods which’re Precisely Engineered and Carefully Produced under Strict Quality Control. Our products and service include but not limited to: _Fasteners. _Cosmetics & Bath & Hygienic Products and Consumables. _Electronic Products & Electric Home Appliance. _Metallic & Non-metallic Mineral Ores. _Construction & Decoration Materials, Al or Al-alloy Sections, Stone-slab & Stone-block. _Equipment & Production Line (as agency), Parts & Components, Tools. _Lubricant Oil and Grease & Cutting Liquid & Washing Detergent & Addictives.
